data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Lili, Yang, Ding (2005): Species of Nepalomyia (Diptera: Dolichopodidae) from Guangxi, China, with a key to Palaearctic and Oriental species. Zootaxa 1058: 51-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170148
